oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letter from Cpl. Henry Marshall Misemer, Co. F, 3rd Tenn. Cav. Regt., USA, to his wife Martha
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Cpl. Misemer explains they have moved 8 miles from Nashville on the Nashville and Northwestern Railroad and plan to stay there for the summer. He also states that he has not been paid and is not getting a furlough. He comments that he received a letter from a relative in Riceville, Tennessee. For the entire collection of letters, see also Mf. # 2008, the Henry Marshall Misemer Civil War Letters.
